name: The Aviator Mug
description:
This color will be back in 2014. Please visit www.loyalstricklin.com for the rest of my products.

Leather wrapped mason jar coffee mug.

Button stud on the bottom of the handle allows the mug to be attached to bags, handlebars, beltloops, or whatever else it will fit over!

4 ounce vegetable-tanned leather.

8 ounce vegetable-tanned handle

Removable for easy cleaning

Hand Cut, Sewn, and Dyed in Auburn, AL, USA.

Made to Order. Please allow one week for product to be made.


Stitching:
Tan
Navy (shown)
Rust
Turquoise
